channel.title: Help needed with an error I got
channel.description:
Name says it all...error says:
Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops<NPCHandler.java:1404 at NPCHandler.<init> <NPCHandler.java:22 at server.main<server.java:27>
can anybody help me... oh, if it helps, I have Mod Tharok's perfect compiler v1.9, and I compiled, then ran it, and it came up with that message... i need help please?
No, i don't know why it calls it pimpscape, cuz its phonescape, it just does for some wierd reason! It always has done, and it's worked fine like that.
Can anyone help me please?

item.title: Help needed with an error I got
item.dc:creator: @toastface5 toastface5
item.description:
@toastface5 wrote:

Name says it all…error says:

Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1
at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops<NPCHandler.java:1404
at NPCHandler. <NPCHandler.java:22
at server.mainserver.java:27

can anybody help me… oh, if it helps, I have Mod Tharok’s perfect compiler v1.9, and I compiled, then ran it, and it came up with that message… i need help please?

No, i don’t know why it calls it pimpscape, cuz its phonescape, it just does for some wierd reason! It always has done, and it’s worked fine like that.

Can anyone help me please?

Read full topic
item.source: Help needed with an error I got
